Package vhdlgenerator.texteditor

package vhdlgenerator.texteditor
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Editor
    this class create a TextEditor to write VHDL CODE.
    LinePainter
    this class Track the movement of the Caret by painting the background line at the current caret/cursor position.
    SymbolType
    this interface determine the type of the VHDL symbol language (KEYWORDS,Data Types,Operators,...)
    SyntaxHighlighting
    this class do the syntax highlighting for the VHDL LANG KEYWORDS
    Token
    this class determine what type of Symbol we have and his value.
    VhdlSyntax
    scanner for the VHDL programming language
